Test Case Description: Verify user login with valid credentials
Test Steps:
1. Open app
2. Navigate to login
3. Enter valid credentials
4. Click login
Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard

Test Case Description: Check error message for invalid login
Test Steps:
1. Open app
2. Navigate to login
3. Enter invalid credentials
4. Click login
Expected Result: Error message 'Invalid username or password' is displayed

Test Case Description: Test multi-language support for the homepage
Test Steps:
1. Open app
2. Select language option
3. Verify text changes
Expected Result: Content updates to the selected language without layout issues
Actual Result: Language switched successfully, minor alignment issue
Remarks: Alignment issue in the header section
